long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly collect and import LinkedIn audiences into your Highperformr app with just a few clicks.

This powerful extension lets you gather people who liked or commented on LinkedIn posts, search results, or specific profiles, and instantly send them to your desired audience segment in Highperformr. No more manual work—streamline your workflow and focus on growing your connections.

Plus, enhance your @mention experience while crafting posts directly in Highperformr. Start building smarter, more targeted social strategies today!
